Bring Your 3D Models to Life

A FREE & open-source web application that allows you to animate your 3D models. Animate both humanoid and four-legged creatures.

Features

Human & Animal rigs

  • Supports importing GLB, GLTF, and FBX models
  • Human and animal skeleton options
  • Intuitive skeleton positioning

Export Animations

  • T-Pose and A-Pose models supported workflows
  • Animations provided (free human animation library from Quaternius)
  • Choose multiple animations to export for web or game engines with GLB

Video Walkthrough

FREE & Open-Source

Mesh2Motion is an open-source project. With the way 3d animations and modeling tools are progressing, there just needs to be some tool like this that is open-source that can evolve. The goal of this project is to provide a free and easy way to animate 3D models for web and game engines. Everything should be freely available for both personal and commerical projects.

Check out the GitHub repository for all the code.
